scripts.dev-server: nodemon -e js,jsx,scss --exec NODE_ENV=local BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 BABEL_ENV=server babel-node server/startup/app.js
scripts.build-web: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=web webpack-cli --config webpack/webpack.config.js && npm run _build-shared
scripts.build-all: npm run build-web && npm run build-server && npm run build-webpack
